attributes.action: help stress the fact that We the undersigned believe that it is in Derby Countys best interest to not buy varney but keep Tito villa instead:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the loyal fans of derby county football club want the board of directors to listen to our please to keep tito villa at the club rather than signing luke varney

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
